name: Toy Trouble
description:
You fell asleep in the toy store during your shift! Now it's dark outside and a toy in the store is making weird noises... What's up with that? Investigate the creepy sounds and silence the source with your baseball bat! Hurry, before it's too late...

Gameplay features:
  • Find and eliminate a mimic hiding among the toys
  • You have 120 seconds to locate the mimic
  • Wait and listen for the sound cues of the mimic!
  • Don't break too much stuff, the bat is fragile and will break after too many hits...
Controls

WASD - move

Mouse 1 - swing the bat

Ctrl - crouch

Created as a project of the Tampere University of Applied Sciences GameCamp 2021 by students. Feedback is very welcome!

Team:

Eero Salmi: Programming, Audio, Animation

Laura Huovinen: Programming 

Jirko Haapapuro: Level Design, Graphic Design, Environmental Design, Post FX

Juho Mansikka: Graphic Design

Ada Ikonen: Graphic Design
